help.title: FlashBot Help

command.DESC: The command to see command help

help.sentToDM: Sent the help messages to your DM.
help.firstMsg:
Thank you for using FlashBot! Flashbot is actively being developed to have many features; games, utility tools and more.

Check out the links below to see the docs and help manuals. (use `{{{prefix}}}{{{cmdcall}}} <command name>` for specific command help)

userinfo.title: User information of %1$s
userinfo.name: User Name

user.DESC: The user to show their information

userinfo.notInGuild: This page is not available outside server channels.
userinfo.memberNotExist: This page is not available because the user is not in this server.

eval.desc: Evaluates JS code. Needs Administrator permission to use this.
eval.title: Eval

reload.error: An error occured while reloading the command: %1$s

say.embedFooter: To prevent abusing, the member who runs the command is displayed. (Except Bot Owner, Server Administrator and DM)

locale.noLanguage: The language you entered does not exist.
locale.DESC: See or change the bot locale on the server.
locale.noPermission: You don't have `%1$s` permission to do that.

activate.title: Activate **FlashBot**
activate.agree: Thank you! You agreed with our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. The Bot is now activated on this server.
activate.content: Some features of **Flashbot** need to store some server information to our database. You need to agree for this to activate the bot on this server.
activate.DESC: Activate this bot on the server
activate.alreadyActivated: This bot is already activated on this server.
activate.notExecutor: Only the command executor can press the button.

deactivate.title: Deactivate **FlashBot**
deactivate.content: You're now going to deactivate FlashBot on this server. Some of the features which uses the stored information related to this server will be disabled. You can re-activate using the `%1$sactivate` command. **(Note: The actual data will not be deleted when deactivated. Please contact us in the Support Server if you want to delete the data.)**
deactivate.agree: The bot is now deactivated in this server. To reactivate, use the `%1$sactivate` command.
deactivate.DESC: Deactivate this bot on the server
deactivate.notExecutor: Only the command executor can press the button.

load.error: An Error occured when loading the command: %1$s
load.alreadyExists: That command (or aliases in it) already exists.

unload.error: An Error occured while unloading the command: %1$s

user.DESC: The user to show their progile image

name.NAME: name
name.DESC: The name of the data to purge cache. (guild / user)

savenow.DESC: Saves the json database file now.

support.text: Join the Support server and get support.
support.DESC: Gives the link to the support server.

cmd.NAME: command
cmd.DESC: The command to run on the shell.

register.title: Flashbot user registration
register.content: We need to register your information to the bot. If you agree, you can register.
register.DESC: Register you as a Flashbot user.

generate-bot-invite.noArgs: Enter the bot `@mention` or its ID after the command to generate bot invite link.
generate-bot-invite.userProvided: Please enter the **bot** `@mention` or its ID.
generate-bot-invite.invalidID: Incorrect bot ID provided. Please enter the bot `@mention` or its ID **correctly**.
generate-bot-invite.DESC: Generate invite link of any bot.

bot.DESC: The id or mention of the bot you want to invite

stat.total: Total command execution on this session: %1$s
stat.DESC: Provides some stats about the bot.

error.noDataFolder: Typing data folder does not exist. Please post an issue on the Support Server.
error.noLocaleFolder: No locale folder found in typing data folder. Please post an issue on the Support Server.
error.noPermissionToReload: Only the owners of the bot can reload the typing data.
error.langNotExist: That language is unsupported in typing game.
error.noDataInCategory: There is no data in this category.

typing.start:
Type below sentence **correctly**! (Time limit: 1 minute)
Category: %2$s (`%3$s`)```
%1$s
```
typing.loading: Loading typing data... (This job will run only first time, so please wait a bit)
typing.finish: The typing game ended because no one entered the correct sentence.
typing.notMatch: The sentence you entered does not match.
typing.alreadyPlaying: The typing game is already playing in this channel.
typing.notPlaying: The typing game is not playing in this channel.

prefix.info: This server's bot prefix is `%1$s`. If you want to change bot prefix, please type `%1$sprefix set <new prefix>`.

set.pleaseEnterPrefix: Please type `%1$sprefix set <new prefix>` to change this server's bot prefix.
set.complete: This server's bot prefix has been changed to `%1$s`.
set.tooLong: Bot prefix cannot be long than 11 characters.
set.noPerms: You need to have `Manage Server` permission to set the server prefix.

prefix.DESC: See or set the bot's prefix on the server.

hello.title: Hello!
hello.description:
Thank you for using **FlashBot**!
**Flashbot** serves various features.

%1$s
You can see help message using `%2$shelp`.

prefix.guild: Bot prefix on this server is `%1$s`.
prefix.dm: You won't need prefix in DMs.

invite.text:
Press the below button to invite FlashBot
Also, give me :heart: in koreanbots!

dice.error: Please enter **an integer equal or greater than 1** for number of dice faces.

sides.DESC: The number of sides of a dice

maintenance.usage:
```
Usage: %1$smaintenance (status)

(status) - Set the maintenance mode status
  [start / on / 시작] - Start maintenance mode
  [end / off / 종료] - End maintenance mode
```

tictactoe.waiting:
<@%1$s> is waiting for you to play tic-tac-toe together!
Press :white_check_mark: if you want to play!
(Press :x: to cancel the game)
tictactoe.noOneJoined: No one joined in 20 seconds, so the game was cancelled.

game.title: Tic-Tac-Toe
game.timeOut: Input time exceeded, so %1$s won the tic-tac-toe game!
game.draw: The tic-tac-toe game ended in a draw!

error.alreadyMarked: That position is already marked. Please select other position.
error.notPlaying: The tic-tac-toe game is not running.

tictactoe.usage:
Usage: ```
%1$stictactoe <start/stop>

<start> - Start the tic-tac-toe game.
<stop> - Force stop the running tic-tac-toe game.
```
tictactoe.alreadyPlaying: The tictactoe game is already playing in this channel.

sample.DESC: This is a sample command. Nothing happens.

uptime.title: Bot Uptime
uptime.description: The bot was running for %s milliseconds
uptime.DESC: Shows the uptime of the bot.

permcheck.isOwner: You are the owner of this server. All permissions are granted for you.
permcheck.isAdmin: You have the `ADMINISTRATOR` permission in this channel. All permissions are granted for you.

target.DESC: The id or mention of member to see permissions

notice.confirm: Send this announcement to all servers?
notice.timeOut: Input timed out, so sending announcements is cancelled automatically.
notice.started: Started the announcement sending process. This may take a lot of time.

error.noText: Please enter the announcement text you want to send after the command.

error.DESC: Force throw error for test purpose.

activity.DESC: activity name you want to play (youtube, betrayal, fishington)

vcactivity.noPerms: The bot needs `Create Invite` permission to create links to play activity.
vcactivity.needToJoinVC: Please enter a voice channel and rerun this command. (or pass the voice channel id after the activity name)

run.ownerOnly: Only the owners of the bot can run this command.
run.guildOnly: This command can only be used in the server text channel.

CommandHandler.noUserPermission: You need to have `%1$s` permissions to use this command.
CommandHandler.unregisteredOwner: [Warning] You are the ot's owner, but you're not registered. Errors which doesn't exists in normal situations may occur.
CommandHandler.noClientPermission: Please grant `%1$s` permission to the bot to use this command.

ClientError.error:
An unexpected Error occured. Please report this error message and the Error ID to the Support server.
예상치 못한 오류가 발생하였습니다. 지원 서버에 오류 메세지랑 오류 ID를 제보해 주세요.

Error message (오류 메세지): ```
%1$s
```
Error ID (오류 ID): `%2$s`

Go to online docs for more information.
(Use `{{{prefix}}}help` to get the link)

pleaseRegister.guild: You need to register this server in order to use this feature. Please register using the `%1$sactivate` command.

usage.detailedHelpNotice:
Go to online docs for more information.
(Use `{{{prefix}}}help` to get the link)

error.DBNotReady:
This feature needs the database storage, but the bot is not connected to the storage. Please report this to the Support server to be fixed.
이 기능은 데이터베이스가 필요하지만, 현재 봇이 데이터베이스에 접근할 수 없습니다. 지원 서버에 문의를 남겨주세요.
error.maintenance:
Currently the bot is under maintenance. You cannot use all features while under maintenance. If you want to check scheduled maintenance, please join to our Support Server:
현재 봇이 점검중입니다. 점검중에는 모든 서비스를 이용할 수 없습니다. 예정된 점검을 확인하려면 지원 서버에 입장하세요.
https://discord.gg/epY3waF

LOW.name: Low
LOW.description: Must have a verified email on their Discord account.

MEDIUM.name: Medium
MEDIUM.description: Must also be registered on Discord for longer than 5 minutes.

HIGH.name: High (╯°□°）╯︵ ┻━┻
HIGH.description: Must also be a member of this server for longer than 10 minutes.

VERY_HIGH.name: Very High ┻━┻ ﾐヽ(ಠ益ಠ)ノ彡┻━┻
VERY_HIGH.description: Must have a verified phone on their Discord account.

whyNoticeSentHere.title: Why this announcement delivered here?
whyNoticeSentHere.content:
Typically, bot announcement is sent to random channel. If you want to set specific bot announcement channel, choose one method below:

* Put `FlashBot공지` or `FlashBot-공지` in the channel topic (takes prioirty)
* Create the channel with the name `봇공지` or `봇-공지`
